stressed.title: Mac and Cheese
stressed.instructions: Boil pasta until tender. Drain and return to pot. Add cheese, milk, and butter. Stir until creamy. Serve hot.

stressed.title: Chocolate Cake
stressed.instructions: Preheat oven to 350째F (175째C). Mix flour, cocoa powder, and sugar. Add eggs, melted butter, and milk. Pour into a greased cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.

happy.title: Cupcakes
happy.instructions: Preheat oven to 350째F (175째C). Mix flour, sugar, and butter. Add eggs and vanilla. Pour into cupcake liners and bake for 15-20 minutes.

happy.title: Fruit Salad
happy.instructions: Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces. Drizzle with honey and mix well. Chill before serving.

excited.title: Spicy Tacos
excited.instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. Drizzle with hot sauce.

excited.title: Buffalo Wings
excited.instructions: Fry chicken wings until crispy. Toss with melted butter and hot sauce. Serve with celery and blue cheese dressing.

sad.title: Comforting Chicken Soup
sad.instructions: In a pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Add chicken, chopped carrots, and celery. Cook until chicken is done. Add noodles and simmer until cooked.

sad.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
sad.instructions: Butter the outside of two slices of bread. Place cheese between the slices. Grill in a pan over medium heat until golden brown on both sides.

relaxed.title: Herbal Tea
relaxed.instructions: Steep tea leaves in hot water for 5 minutes. Sweeten with honey and add lemon to taste.

relaxed.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
relaxed.instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Mix with diced cucumber, tomato, olive oil, lemon juice, and feta cheese.
